description:
Like peanut butter or salsa, people like different things. This chalk has a chunky texture so you crush it between your fingers before you set off with purpose.

  • Now shipping in fully recyclable packaging, your favourite chalk now has a smaller footprint
  • Contains just pure chalk with no potentially harmful drying agents and impurities
  • Won't overdry your skin and protects it from drying out or cracking
name: Friction Labs Gorilla Grip Chunky Chalk 340g
